    n = input()

a=len(n)

x=[]

 # ì…ë ¥ë°›ì€ ë¬¸ìì—´ nì„ ì›ì†Œë§ˆë‹¤ xì— ì¶”ê°€
for i in range(a):x.append(int(n[i]))

 # sortì— reverse íŒŒë¼ë¯¸í„° ì´ìš©
x.sort(reverse=True)

for i in x:
    print(i,end='')
